meanings.sent1: The road had many upcurves, making the drive more interesting.
meanings.sent2: The upcurves on the roller coaster provided an exhilarating experience.
meanings.sent3: The upcurves in the hiking trail made it feel like a fun adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her smile created an upcurves effect on her face, showing her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The upcurves shape of the hill made it perfect for sledding in the winter.

meanings.definition: To form a curve that slopes upwards.
meanings.sent1: She carefully upcurves the line to create a smiley face in her drawing.
meanings.sent2: The artist upcurves the brush strokes to give the painting a sense of movement.
meanings.sent3: He upcurves the road on the model train set, adding a playful touch.
meanings.sent4: The dancer upcurves her body gracefully, adding elegance to her performance.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches upcurves towards the sky, reaching for the sunlight.
